markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Phase Familiar](/Spells.aspx?ID=804)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Hex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=324" />
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=323" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 239 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Reaction" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

**Trigger** Your familiar would take damage.

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 60 feet

**Target** your familiar
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You draw upon your patron's power to momentarily shift your familiar from its solid, physical form into an ephemeral version of itself shaped of mist. Your familiar gains resistance 5 to all damage and is immune to precision damage. These apply only against the triggering damage.

---
**Heightened (+1)** Increase the resistance by 2.
name: Phase Familiar

summary_markdown: You draw upon your patron's power to momentarily shift your familiar from its solid, physical form into an ephemeral version of itself shaped of mist.
text: Phase Familiar Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 239 2.0 Cast Reaction somatic Trigger Your familiar would take damage. Range 60 feet Target your familiar --- You draw upon your patron's power to momentarily shift your familiar from its solid, physical form into an ephemeral version of itself shaped of mist. Your familiar gains resistance 5 to all damage and is immune to precision damage. These apply only against the triggering damage. --- Heightened (+1) Increase the resistance by 2.
